item.description:
NEXT EVENTS:

Celebrate After Halloween with us at our MONSTER MASH DANCE PARTY on Saturday November 6th at Dance Fever, 200 Wells Ave., Newton, MA from 7:30 to Midnight.



AND



Enter Our After Halloween Costume Contest. The Winner Will Receive A Prize.



Don't miss our meet everyone Dance introduction at 8PM



We’re asking everyone to participate and bring a dessert, appetizer or beverage to share. Our goal is to give you a house party atmosphere and a chance to meet someone special.



DJ Adam will be playing the Monster Mash and your favorite dance music with free raffle prizes given away during the evening.



Come with or without a costume, but let's make this a fun evening.



AND



Let's have an equal number of men and women and make this a "yes" dance



Cost is only $15.00 plus food or drink to share; $25.00 without.



If Your Last Name

Begins with......Bring



A-G.....A bottle of wine



H-L (2) 2 liter bottles of soda (diet or regular)



M-Q.....Cut up fruit or cheese and crackers



R-Z.....A Goblin dessert to delight



Directions: Only 6 minutes from the Rt 95/128 Highland Ave (towards Newton) exit. Drive 0.4 miles after exiting Rt 95/128 and turn right on 2nd Ave (Staples on left and Panera on right)and drive for 0.4 miles. When 2nd Ave ends turn Left on Kendrick St. Drive 0.3 miles. At traffic light, turn Right on Wells Ave. Drive 0.5 miles and Dance Fever is on the left.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Saturday, April 10th - BIG dance party at Temple Emunah's social hall, 9 Piper Rd., Lexington from 8:30 PM to 12:30AM. Please click "More" (right below the group name), then click "Files" to view the flier.

If you have any questions, please call Barry at 508-333-1466 or Stan at 508-572-9049







---------------------

Weekend trip to NYC! June 5th & 6th. We expect a full bus, so take a look at all we're providing and get your payment and reservation form in quickly. We're also getting together with a NYC Meetup.com group for a Saturday night social!!!!

Please click "More" (right below the group name), then click "Files" to view the flier and optional tours we've set up for you.

------------------------------------







PAST EVENTS: Click "Photos" on the left side of the screen to see the fun events you've either attended or missed.

Our goal is to bring singles 40-65 together by providing meetup events and through TOTALLY FREE Internet dating. Let's make new friends and connections!

Please ask your friends to join in on the fun. Joining the group is free! Sending emails to others and receiving emails from other members is also free.

Feel free to email other members, but please use common sense about revealing personal information. We do not screen members in any way. We feel that meeting other members at a social function is one of the safest and best ways to communicate and form a connection. We look forward to seeing you at our events.







(If you discover that a member is married OR if you have problems with any member, please let us know ASAP.)

Stan and Barry
item.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group
